message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1200000, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. Given its importance to both parties, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This represents a remarkable opportunity to secure a piece that is worth $1000000 to you, at a discount that could be highly beneficial. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to your positive response.
